attributes.action: MP's to give up their pay rise for the inept failure to act on a Democratic vote
attributes.additional_details: Not one MP deserves a pay rise for the inept handling of Brexit. The democratic vote of Britain has been totally ignored. In any other sphere of business, they would all be fired let alone award themselves a massive pay rise.
attributes.background: No matter how you think about Brexit, Parliament has failed the British public by not delivering a Democratic vote. Democracy as we know it died on 29/3/19. If anyone was working in any industry were this inept, they would be fired, let alone award themselves a pay rise. All MP's should not have one

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us
